text: Agim Ademi (born 19 October 1961) is a football administrator and former player. He is president of the Football Federation of Kosovo from 6 July 2018. ==Personal life== Agim Ademi is married and is living in Pristina. He studied Science in Homeland Security and Emergency Management. ==Career== From 1975 until 1988 was an active footballer. ==Football Federation of Kosovo== From 2000 until 6 July 2018, he made his contribution as Vice President of the Football Federation of Kosovo, and from that day he was entrusted with the post of President of the Football Federation of Kosovo, where he was unanimously voted by 58 delegates to the Extraordinary Electoral Assembly, with four-year term 2018-2022, as the position of president had remained vacant following the death of Fadil Vokrri. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Kosovan footballers
title: Agim Ademi
